import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Button, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import AccomCard from './AccomCard.js' import NewAccom from './NewAccom.js' export default class EventCard extends Component { constructor(){ super() } render() { const myAccom = this.props.event.acommodations.map(accommodation => ) return (
{this.props.event.name}
{this.props.event.date}
{this.props.event.location}

Accommodations
{/* {this.props.event.accommodations.map(accommodation => accommodation.location)}

*/}
Activities
{this.props.event.activities.map(activity => activity.description)}

Flights
{this.props.event.flights.map(flight => flight.flight_info)}

Expenses
{this.props.event.expenses.map(expense => expense.description)}
${this.props.event.expenses.map(expense => expense.total)}

) } }
